page.title: 15THINGS WE DO AT SCHOOL
page.content: On Monday mornings we go{swimming}at Blackshotts pool in{Grays.}On other mornings we begin with a school{ {assembly. } Most of the school work is{topic} based, although we usually tend to do the{Language}and{Maths.}work connected with the{topic}during the morning. Sometimes we follow{television}or{ {radio}broadcasts if they are suitable for the topic we are studying, but we mainly collect our{information}by {visiting places, having visits}from people who are connected with what we're studying or by{interviewing {people.}We find things out at home too as well as bring useful things in to school. Our present topic is linked with the{Domesday Project.}We held{ {King William's Court}in church,{Beat {the Bounds of Bulphan}and organised{a {Medieval Fayre.
